entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
